Class Trader

  • java.lang.Object
    • Trader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player, Store

    public abstract class Trader
extends java.lang.Object
    A Trader represents an object in the game that has the ability to buy and sell goods to others who are also Traders
    Author:
    Max

      Trader()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Trader

        public Trader()

    • Method Detail

      • buyResourceFromSeller

        public void buyResourceFromSeller(Trader seller,
                         Resource rType,
                         int price)
                           throws FailedTransactionException
        This method is used to carry out a transaction between a buyer (this) and a seller involving a resource. Possible Buyer-Seller Pairs: Player-Player Player-Store Store-Player
        Parameters:
        seller - Trader who is selling the resource
        rType - The type of resource that is being traded
        price - The price of the resource that is being traded
        Throws:
        FailedTransactionException - Thrown when a buyer (this) does not have enough money, or when the seller does not have the resource in stock.

      • removeResource

        public void removeResource(Resource rType)
                    throws FailedTransactionException
        Decrements the amount of the given resource that the Trader has by one.
        Parameters:
        rType - The type of Resource to remove
        Throws:
        FailedTransactionException - Thrown when the Trader does not have any units of the resource, in which case it is impossible to remove a unit of the resource.

      • addResource

        public void addResource(Resource rType)
        Increments the amount of the given resource that the Trader has by one.
        Parameters:
        rType - The type of Resource to add

      • buyMuleFromSeller

        public abstract void buyMuleFromSeller(Trader seller,
                     Resource muleConfig,
                     int price)
                                throws FailedTransactionException
        Carries out a mule sale transaction between this Trader (the buyer) and another Trader (the seller).
        Parameters:
        seller - The Trader selling the mule
        muleConfig - The ResourceType that the mule has been configured to produce
        price - The amount that the mule is being purchased for
        Throws:
        FailedTransactionException - Thrown if the buyer does not have enough money to pay for the mule, or if the seller has no mules to sell

      • buyLandFromSeller

        public abstract void buyLandFromSeller(Trader seller,
                     int price)
                                throws FailedTransactionException
        Carries out the transaction when a Trader purchases a LandPlot. LandPlot sales can occur during Land Auctions or during Development by visiting the Land Office.
        Parameters:
        seller - The Trader who is selling the land
        price - The amount this Trader (the buyer) must pay
        Throws:
        FailedTransactionException - Thrown if the buyer cannot afford the price
